merchant.name: Merchant
merchant.text:
+1 Card
+1 Action
The first time you play a Silver this turn, +1 Gold

remodel.name: Remodel
remodel.text: Trash a card from your hand. Gain a card costing up to 2 Gold more than it

throneRoom.name: Throne Room
throneRoom.text: You may play an action from your hand twice

artisan.name: Artisan
artisan.text: Add a card to your hand costing up to 5 Gold. Put a card from your hand onto your deck

witch.name: Witch
witch.text:
+2 Cards
Each other player gains a curse

library.name: Library
library.text: Draw until you have 7 cards in hand, skipping any Action cards you choose to. Set those cards aside, discarding them afterwards

militia.name: Militia
militia.text:
+2 Gold
Each other player discards down to 3 cards in hand

harbinger.name: Harbinger
harbinger.text:
+1 Card
+1 Action
Look through your discard pile. You may put a card from it onto your deck
